description: Try our easy to follow Thor Egg & Hammer Toast Soldiers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Boiled eggs,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg,Ham,Halal,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thor Egg & Hammer Toast Soldiers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place eggs in a saucepan. Cover with cold water. Cover with lid and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer gently for 3 minutes. Remove pan from heat. Using a slotted spoon, transfer eggs to egg cups. Cut off tops and serve with toast.
